random_seed.description: Random seed used when training the meta-SAE.
random_seed.title: Random Seed

width_ratio.description: Meta-SAE width as a fraction of the base SAE width (d_sae * width_ratio).
width_ratio.title: Meta-SAE Width Ratio

k.description: Average number of active latents to maintain during meta-SAE training.
k.title: BatchTopK k

train_steps.description: Number of training steps to run when fitting the meta-SAE.
train_steps.title: Training Steps

train_batch_size.description: Number of decoder rows to use per meta-SAE training batch.
train_batch_size.title: Training Batch Size

learning_rate.description: Learning rate for the meta-SAE Adam optimizer.
learning_rate.title: Learning Rate

weight_decay.description: Weight decay to apply while training the meta-SAE.
weight_decay.title: Weight Decay

autocast.description: Whether to enable torch.autocast during meta-SAE training.
autocast.title: Use Autocast

eval_batch_size.description: Batch size used to compute decoder variance explained.
eval_batch_size.title: Eval Batch Size

dead_feature_window.description: Steps before a latent is considered dead for auxiliary losses.
dead_feature_window.title: Dead Feature Window

feature_sampling_window.description: Steps between sparsity statistics resets during training.
feature_sampling_window.title: Feature Sampling Window

dtype.description: Datatype to use for meta-SAE training.
dtype.title: Meta-SAE DType

meta_sae.description: Metrics for the meta-SAE decoder variance evaluation.
meta_sae.title: Meta-SAE

decoder_fraction_variance_explained.description: Fraction of variance in the base SAE decoder reconstructed by the meta-SAE.
decoder_fraction_variance_explained.title: Decoder Fraction Variance Explained

train_time_seconds.description: Wall-clock seconds spent fitting the meta-SAE.
train_time_seconds.title: Training Time (s)

final_reconstruction_mse.description: Mean squared reconstruction error on the decoder matrix after training.
final_reconstruction_mse.title: Final Reconstruction MSE

description: Evaluation measuring how well a BatchTopK meta-SAE compresses the decoder matrix of a base SAE.

eval_id.description: A unique UUID identifying this specific eval run
eval_id.title: ID

datetime_epoch_millis.description: The datetime of the evaluation in epoch milliseconds
datetime_epoch_millis.title: DateTime (epoch ms)

eval_result_metrics.description: The metrics of the evaluation, organized by category. Define your own categories and the metrics that go inside them.
eval_result_metrics.title: Result Metrics Categorized

sae_bench_commit_hash.description: The commit hash of the SAE Bench that ran the evaluation.
sae_bench_commit_hash.title: SAE Bench Commit Hash

sae_lens_id.description: The ID of the SAE in SAE Lens.
sae_lens_id.title: SAE Lens ID

sae_lens_release_id.description: The release ID of the SAE in SAE Lens.
sae_lens_release_id.title: SAE Lens Release ID

sae_lens_version.description: The version of SAE Lens that ran the evaluation.
sae_lens_version.title: SAE Lens Version

sae_cfg_dict.description: The configuration of the SAE (custom or from SAE Lens) that ran the evaluation. This should match the SAE Lens config schema.
sae_cfg_dict.title: SAE Config Dict

eval_result_unstructured.description: Optional. Any additional outputs that don't fit into the structured eval_result_metrics or eval_result_details fields. Since these are unstructured, don't expect this to be easily renderable in UIs, or contain any titles or descriptions.
eval_result_unstructured.title: Unstructured Results

title: Meta-SAE Decoder Variance
